General.Name: Central Omega Resources Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Central Omega Resources Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the mineral mining business in Indonesia. It explores for nickel ores. PT Central Omega Resources Tbk was formerly known as PT Duta Kirana Finance Tbk and changed its name to PT Central Omega Resources Tbk in 2008. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Central Omega Resources Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Jinsheng Mining.
